response: Press the GFCI’s RESET button, unplug and re-plpug the mains cord, then open the Service UI → “Reboot” dialog.

The Pulley is a servicing part of the Hiron lock, located within the lock housing. To locate, remove the access panel cover inside the cooler. Using a PH2 screwdriver, remove the two screws. Once removed, you can access the pulley.
